titleStmt.title: A word in season: being the commentary of Dr. Martin Luther, on three selected Psalms: viz. the CXXIVth, CXXVth, and CXXIXth. With his commentary on some part of the fourth and fifth chapters of the First Epistle of St. Peter. Being of special use for the present times.
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.

titleStmt.title: A word in season: being the commentary of Dr. Martin Luther, on three selected Psalms: viz. the CXXIVth, CXXVth, and CXXIXth. With his commentary on some part of the fourth and fifth chapters of the First Epistle of St. Peter. Being of special use for the present times.
titleStmt.author: Luther, Martin, 1483-1546.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Larkin at the lower end of Broad-street, next to London-Wall.,
